title: Kindred Double Wolf with W+E
body: If you proc your third hit on Mounting Dread (E) while Wolf's Frenzy (W) is still active, another Wolf will temporarily spawn for the duration on Mounting Dread's attack animation. This is different from the permanent Double Wolf glitch as a 3rd Wolf will spawn if the Double Wolf glitch is active. This only happens occasionally.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! In the future, please report PBE issues on the [PBE boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/dxVMgVoG-pbe-reporting-bugs-that-occur-on-pbe). It helps us keep better track of issues on live versus the PBE environment. ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=awKHwGyg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-18T23:31:19.418+0000)
>
> Hiya! 
> 
> Thanks for the report! In the future, please report PBE issues on the [PBE boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/dxVMgVoG-pbe-reporting-bugs-that-occur-on-pbe). It helps us keep better track of issues on live versus the PBE environment. ^-^

Sorry! I thought this was the PBE boards. I probably should've checked.

I'm sorry but that really doesn't work, as there's zero communication so far with the 5.19 patch. Somehow things like Ryze, Darius & Skarner get pushed to live without any of the testers' complaints being acknowledged.

Would you mind nudging the people who are supposed to oversee the PBE board? Even in Kindred's official board, there is no red response.

While not every post may be replied to (I handle a lot of the PBE posts regarding skins), we do read through them all. I can speak from personal experience - it can be a bit tough to get to every comment, and sometimes, the same question is brought up several times, and I've only answered it once. 

For a bit more context, there isn't one person who oversees everything - each of us is responsible for the posts we make.  For example, I was working on the Warden/Marauder skins last patch on PBE. 

That said, I can poke the person who posted Kindred's champion post.
